description: This shirt is a Saturday-afternoon classic. But why only wear it on the weekend? With fabric blended of responsibly sourced Merino wool and recycled polyester, flatlock and offset seams that help reduce chafing, and quick dry times that help alleviate that sticky-wet sweat, our Mountain Trail Graphic Short Sleeve Tee brings the comfort for days. Whether you wear it for casual day at the office, an afternoon out about town, or just relaxing on the couch, this tee will remind you that weekdays are for comfort too.
name: Smartwool Mountain Trail Graphic SS Tee - Unisex
